lms_rozier_convers.core.card

Class CardFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • lms_rozier_convers.core.AbstractFactory
      • lms_rozier_convers.core.card.CardFactory

  • public class CardFactory
extends AbstractFactory
    This class is charged to provide the client with a requested type of Card. It has in its source code the properties of the various cards, so that adding new Cards respects the IN/OUT principle. 16/11/2015.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public Card create(java.lang.String cardType)
        Creates an instance of a specified library item. It is easy to add new types of items, one just have to add it as a new key of the Card attribute borrowingLengthPerItem.
        Parameters:
        cardType -
        Returns:
